events.name: Agile: A brisk walk
events.description:
Wondering, if this talk could be useful?  Lets find out what's on offer for everyone: For Developers/Quality Engineers/Business Analysts: If you are keen to understand Agile principles and methodologies, verify your understanding about it, or just share your story with Agile, this talk will cover ways for meaningful Agile adoption and achieving efficiency in work For Project/Program Managers: If you are interested to understand if Agile can help your team's efficiency, or are facing any roadblocks in successful  Agile implementation, you may discover useful tips and tricks here to overcome hurdles and make Agile effective For Organization Change Managers: If you represent a organization, and wondering if Agile may help improve your business's performance, the talk will cover the areas of customer focus, economical constraints and throughput. 


For everyone else: The talk will focus on how a software development and delivery environment can be made more conductive, efficient and economical. If you are interested in Agile, I am sure, you will find a reason to be here. 





Program: 7:00 PM - 7:15 PM: Networking and Refreshments 7:15 PM - 8:00 PM: TechTalk session 8:00 PM - 8:15 PM: Q & A 8:15 PM onwards: Networking and Refreshments
events.location: Microsoft, Level 22 (Conf Room SINOMB 22CF-12), 1 Marina Boulevard, Singapore

events.name: Lazada x DSSG: How Lazada ranks products
events.description: At this meetup, Eugene will be sharing about how Lazada ranks products to improve customer experience and conversion. This is a preview of the same talk at Strata x Hadoop 2016 here: http://conferences.oreilly.com/strata/hadoop-big-data-sg/public/schedule/detail/54542 • RSVPs will open on 25th Nov (12pm) and close on 30th Nov (12pm). • Please refer to the new attendance policy before RSVP to this meetup.  Event details 7pm - 7.15pm: Networking session [casual; small talk]  7.15pm - 8.00pm: How Lazada ranks products to improve customer experience and conversion [core] 8.00pm - 8.30pm: Networking session [casual; small talk]  [] : Suggested rating and topic; ranges from: newbie - casual - core - hardcore.   About our speaker: Eugene Yan is a data scientist at Lazada working on product and user problems to improve the online shopping experience for consumers and sellers across Southeast Asia.  <a href="https://sg.linkedin.com/in/eugeneyan"></a>https://sg.linkedin.com/in/eugeneyan
events.location: IMDA PIXEL Labs@NDC,  111 Middle Road #03-04, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969
